Greeting.1: Oh... it's you. Let's just get this over with
Greeting.2: I guess anyone nowadays thinks they can just walk in and talk to me
Greeting.4: It is good to see you
Greeting.5: My friend, it is so good to see you. I hope you have been doing well

Farewell.4: I hope to see you again soon
Farewell.5: Feel free to come talk to me anytime

Ask_Name.2: What do you call yourself, friend

Response_Ask_Name.3: Shangos the name. This is my game.

Ask_Origin.1: Which village do you come from

Response_Ask_Origin.1: I will leave that to your imagination.
Response_Ask_Origin.3: I come from a place that you won't find on any map.

Ask_About_Oshosi.1: I know that someone like you probably knows nothing I already do not, but what do you know about Oshosi
Ask_About_Oshosi.2: Since you so decided to show up in my presence unnanounced, how about you make yourself useful? What can you tell me about Oshosi
Ask_About_Oshosi.3: What can you tell me about Oshosi
Ask_About_Oshosi.4: I know you're quite well traveled and and learned a lot on those travels. What can you tell me about Oshosi
Ask_About_Oshosi.5: Ah my friend, would you mind helping me learn more about Oshosi?

Response_Ask_About_Oshosi.1: Oshosi is that foolish man that hides away in the mountains to the Northeast of here. He lets his enflated ego get in the way of the safety of the village he lives in
Response_Ask_About_Oshosi.2: Oshosi is a fool of a Hero that runs his mouth more than he should. He resides in the mountains to the Northeast of here
Response_Ask_About_Oshosi.3: Oshosi is the Hero that resides in the mountains to the Northeast of here
Response_Ask_About_Oshosi.4: Oshosi is a brash Hero, but he only has the best of intentions with his actions. He lives in a mountain village to the Northeast of here
Response_Ask_About_Oshosi.5: Oshosi is what I would call a misguided man with a heart of gold. He and I may disagree on things, but we both get along quite well. He lives in the mountains to the Northeast of this village

Ask_About_Ogun.1: I know that someone like you probably knows nothing I already do not, but what do you know about Ogun
Ask_About_Ogun.2: Since you so decided to show up in my presence unnanounced, how about you make yourself useful? What can you tell me about Ogun
Ask_About_Ogun.3: What can you tell me about Ogun
Ask_About_Ogun.4: I know you're quite well traveled and and learned a lot on those travels. What can you tell me about Ogun
Ask_About_Ogun.5: Ah my friend, would you mind helping me learn more about Ogun?

Response_Ask_About_Ogun.1: Ogun is that horrible warrior that hides away in his iron fortress to the North of the desert
Response_Ask_About_Ogun.2: Ogun is a Hero that has made too many enemies for himself by flaunting his militaristic strength. He resides in that iron fortress to the North, you cannot miss it
Response_Ask_About_Ogun.3: Ogun is a Hero that resides in the iron fortress to the North of here
Response_Ask_About_Ogun.4: Ogun is a powerful Hero that lives in the iron fortress that is North of the desert
Response_Ask_About_Ogun.5: Ogun is a strong leader and a powerful Hero that lives in the iron fortress to the North

Ask_About_Oya.1: I know that someone like you probably knows nothing I already do not, but what do you know about Oya
Ask_About_Oya.2: Since you so decided to show up in my presence unnanounced, how about you make yourself useful? What can you tell me about Oya
Ask_About_Oya.3: What can you tell me about Oya
Ask_About_Oya.4: I know you're quite well traveled and and learned a lot on those travels. What can you tell me about Oya
Ask_About_Oya.5: Ah my friend, would you mind helping me learn more about Oya?

Response_Ask_About_Oya.1: She is a silly woman located in the forest to the Southeast
Response_Ask_About_Oya.2: You mean that buffoon of a Hero that lives in the forest to the Southeast
Response_Ask_About_Oya.3: Oya is the Hero that lives in the Southeast forest
Response_Ask_About_Oya.4: Oya is a wise Hero that lives in a village in the forest to the Southeast of here
Response_Ask_About_Oya.5: Ah Oya. She is a wise and respected Hero that lives in a beautiful village located in the forest to the Southeast

Ask_Memories.1: Do you have any memories of your past experiences?

Ask_Specific_Events.1: What are some events that you know of?

Response_Ask_Specific_Events.1: I cannot think of any at the moment.

Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oshosi.1: What do you feel about Oshosi

Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Osh.1: Pssh. I cannot take that foolish man seriously at all. I do not know how the people of the mountain village put up with his false bravado and silly antics
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Osh.2: He lets his infalted ego get to his head. He constantly puts his own agenda before helping the people of the mountain village
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Osh.3: Oshosi and I occasionally talk, but I cannot say that we are close or hostile with one another
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Osh.4: Oshosi is well intentioned with his actions, even though we do not see eye to eye on everything. I am happy to be his friend, though
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Osh.5: I am happy to be close with Oshosi. He is a strong leader and he has supported me countless times in the past

Ask_About_Relationship_With_Ogun.1: What do you feel about Ogun?

Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Ogu.1: I cannot stand that Ogun resides so close to me. The fact that he exists makes me worry constantly for the safety of this village
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Ogu.2: Ogun is a nuisance. I hope he never discovers this village and harms its people
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Ogu.3: Ogun and I are content simply leaving eachother alone
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Ogu.4: Ogun is not simply all strength. I respect him for his cunning as well
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Ogu.5: I feel much more confident in the safety of this village knowing that Ogun and I are on such good terms

Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oya.1: What do you feel about Oya

Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oya.1: Let's just say that Oya and I rarely see eye to eye on anything
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oya.2: I am glad that Oya resides far away from this village so I do not have to deal with her
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oya.3: I wouldn't say that Oya and I are friends, but I definitely would not say we are enemies
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oya.4: Oya is a wise leader whom I respect dearly. I am happy to say that we are both on good terms
Response_Ask_About_Relationship_With_Oya.5: Oya is the wisest person I know. Her wisdom has helped guide me multiple times in the past and I consider her one of my closest friends

Ask_To_Form_Alliance.1: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me

Response_To_Ask_To_Form_Alliance.1: I honestly do not see how allying with you will help this village become any safer
Response_To_Ask_To_Form_Alliance.2: I do not know you that well, but this one time I will go against my better judgement and accept this alliance with you
Response_To_Ask_To_Form_Alliance.3: I think that forming an alliance with you is a situation that benefits the both of us. I accept
Response_To_Ask_To_Form_Alliance.4: I am more than happy to ally with you Shango. I know that you will help make this village safer

Move_To_Conquer_Oshosi.2: I think it would be greatly beneficial to us both if we conquered Oshosi and the mountain village
Move_To_Conquer_Oshosi.3: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer Oshosi and the mountain village

Ask_To_Duel.1: I am looking for an easy fight to loosen up a bit. I suppose you will do
Ask_To_Duel.2: Fight me. I doubt someone of your caliber could even keep up
Ask_To_Duel.3: I am looking for a respectable fight. Are you prepared
Ask_To_Duel.4: I cannot think of a better warrior to test my mettle against. Let's do this

Response_To_Ask_To_Duel.1: I hope you're prepared to lose
Response_To_Ask_To_Duel.2: Hahaha. You're confidence is indeed slightly amusing. However, I hope you know I will win
Response_To_Ask_To_Duel.3: I haven't fought in a bit. I guess I could use a good warm up. I hope you're ready
Response_To_Ask_To_Duel.4: Ah, it'll be fun to fight someone of your caliber
Response_To_Ask_To_Duel.5: Sigh. I do not really want to fight you. But, do not think I will hold back simply because we are friends

Ask_To_Spar.1: It won't help me improve my abilities much, but I think we should spar
Ask_To_Spar.2: I looking for a sparring partner. Do you want to
Ask_To_Spar.3: I need some sparring practice. Would you consider sparring with me
Ask_To_Spar.4: I would love to spar with you. Would you want to

Response_To_Ask_To_Spar.1: I do not see how sparring against you will result in anything but your hurt ego
Response_To_Ask_To_Spar.2: If you want to spar me I hope that you are ready to lose
Response_To_Ask_To_Spar.3: I suppose I could use some practice
Response_To_Ask_To_Spar.4: A spar, huh? I suppose it really couldn't hurt to get some practice in with you
Response_To_Ask_To_Spar.5: Sure, it'll be fun to face such a worthy opponent

Bribe.1: I cannot believe I am asking you of all people, but would you accept this
Bribe.2: Would you be interested in this gift
Bribe.3: I decided to get this for you, hopefully you'll accept it

Response_To_Bribe.1: Do you honesly think I would stoop to your level and accept a bribe
Response_To_Bribe.2: I hope you think better of me than to think I would be swayed so easily by a bribe
Response_To_Bribe.3: I suppose I could consider your offer
Response_To_Bribe.4: I do not usually accept bribes, but I suppose I could make an exception for you

Ask_To_Join_Party.1: Would you be willing to allow me to join you?
Ask_To_Join_Party.2: I would greatly appreciate if you would allow me to stand by your side.
Ask_To_Join_Party.3: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.

Response_To_Ask_To_Join_Party.1: I am not sure I am ready to accept more party members at this time.
Response_To_Ask_To_Join_Party.2: You seem like a smart and capable person. You are in.
Response_To_Ask_To_Join_Party.3: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.

Recruit_For_Party.1: Would you like to join my party?
Recruit_For_Party.2: My party could use a mind like yours. Would you care to join?
Recruit_For_Party.3: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.

Response_To_Recruit_For_Party.1: I will consider your offer, but I cannot say at the moment.
Response_To_Recruit_For_Party.2: I appreciate the offer and I gladly accept.
Response_To_Recruit_For_Party.3: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.

Compliment.2: I belive that you are a strong and wise individual
Compliment.3: I am glad to have met you. I truly believe knowing you has had a positive effect on me and this village

Response_To_Compliment.1: That would actually be flattering if it wasn't coming from you
Response_To_Compliment.4: It is not often people flatter me
Response_To_Compliment.5: Thanks so much, and I could say the same about you

Grovel.1: I am reluctant to do this, but I suppose I must beg for your mercy.
Grovel.2: Please know that I truly meant no harm to you and accept my apology
Grovel.3: My friend, please know that I would never try to harm you. I truly meant no real harm

Response_To_Grovel.1: Oh please get off your knees you're making an absolute fool of yourself
Response_To_Grovel.2: *Sigh* I suppose I can overlook your actions this one time
Response_To_Grovel.4: Please, get off of your knees you do not need to go that far simply to apolgize to me
Response_To_Grovel.5: My friend I would accept an apology from you anytime

Response_To_Move_To_Train.5: I know you're right. This village is vunerable in its current state. I will definitely think about training in order to bolster our defenses

Ask_For_Teaching.1: I would like to be taught by you if you do not mind
Ask_For_Teaching.2: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me

Response_To_Ask_For_Teaching.1: I would rather burn this village to the ground with my own hands than teach someone like you
Response_To_Ask_For_Teaching.3: I suppose teaching you wouldn't hurt
Response_To_Ask_For_Teaching.4: Of course I would be fine teaching you
Response_To_Ask_For_Teaching.5: I would love to teach you. I can probably learn some things myself by teaching you

Offer_Teaching.1: I wouldn't mind imparted some of my knowledge upon you if you are alright with it
Offer_Teaching.2: I believe I could teach you many things that would be of use to you

Response_To_Offer_Teaching.1: Hahaha I honestly be taught by a rat than the likes of you
Response_To_Offer_Teaching.2: I doubt you could teach me anything
Response_To_Offer_Teaching.3: Oh, I suppose being taught by you could not hurt
Response_To_Offer_Teaching.4: I would be more than happy to accept your teaching
Response_To_Offer_Teaching.5: I gladly accept your offer. I would love to be taught by someone like you

Boast.1: I cannot say much about myself, but I sure know that I have no reason to worry about you
Boast.2: I take pride with the lengths I got to in order to keep the oasis village safe
Boast.3: I am pleased to be friends with a strong individual such as yourself, but I still think I can hold my own against you quite well

Response_Boast.2: I am sure you are talking yourself up
Response_Boast.3: I cannot decide as to whether I am impressed or unimpressed
Response_Boast.5: I already knew you were great, but not that great

Intimidate.1: I am absolutely sick of you. If someone doesn't take you out soon I just might do it myself
Intimidate.2: You seem good at making enemies, so if I were you I would watch my back

Response_Intimidate.1: Were you trying to scare me, because all you did is make me angry
Response_Intimidate.2: You better choose your future words very carefully
Response_Intimidate.3: Ah... I do not know if I offended you, but if you are mad at me just please leave the oasis village out of it
Response_Intimidate.4: Have I done somehting to you? I thought we were on good terms
Response_Intimidate.5: My friend I do not know if I have done anything to make you say that but I am truly sorry if I have

Insult.1: Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries
Insult.2: The fact that you even think you can call yourself a 'Hero' is an absolute joke

Response_Insult.1: Is that really the best insult you have? Pssh, pathetic
Response_Insult.2: I hope you know that you are playing with fire right now
Response_Insult.3: Oh... that was a pretty awful thing to say
Response_Insult.4: That actually stung quite a bit
Response_Insult.5: What did I do to you to deserve that? I thought we were closer than that

Decline_To_Answer.1: I have nothing to say to that.
Decline_To_Answer.2: I don't know you well enough to reply.

give_quest_hack.1: Wait, don't leave just yet! There is a rogue squadron of rebels north of here. Would you help me protect my people from them
